column4: hi, i just upgraded to a new kernel and it changed by grub file back to booting root (hd0,0), my root prtition is root (hd0,2), how do i make ubuntu know this in future kernel upgrades?
just hit alt+f2 and type gksudo gedit /boot/grub/menu.lst and look for the new kernel entry, then edit it from (hd0,0) to (hd0,2)
